HeroSection.title: Logistics made easy and profitable
HeroSection.subtitle: Obsydian helps you automate your entire supply chain to eliminate Excel spreadsheets, manual work, and repetitive communications, reducing costs and gaining complete visibility.

VentureStudioSection.paragraph1: At Obsydian, we transform how companies manage their transportation costs. Our platform uses advanced AI to automatically audit carrier invoices, detecting errors and discrepancies that traditionally go unnoticed.
VentureStudioSection.paragraph2: We automate the entire process: from invoice reception to claims management. Our AI interprets documents in any format, standardizes them, and compares them with contracts and negotiated rates to identify surcharges, duplicates, and billing errors.
VentureStudioSection.paragraph3: We don't just detect problems, we automatically generate and send claims to your carriers. With our control panel, you have complete visibility of your savings, recovery rate, and key logistics auditing metrics.

ProjectsSection.title: How we make you save
ProjectsSection.paragraph: Obsydian is based on improving efficiency in logistics billing management.
ProjectsSection.case1Desc: Retail company recovers €45,000 annually by detecting fuel surcharges and incorrect rates in their domestic shipments.
ProjectsSection.case2Desc: Logistics company reduced audit time by 30% and increased error detection rate by 85% in international invoices.
ProjectsSection.case3Desc: Industrial manufacturer automated 100% of their claims and improved cost visibility in their supply chain.

ProductFeatureSection.title: The new standard in supply chain
ProductFeatureSection.paragraph: Obsydian automates your entire supply chain — from demand planning to connecting seamlessly with providers, contract negotiation, customs clearance and freight auditing — eliminating Excels, manual work, and hidden costs. Total visibility. Full control.
ProductFeatureSection.feature1Desc: Learning from your historical data to anticipate what you'll need before you do. Detects patterns, trends, and seasonality to generate precise demand forecasts—so you can plan smarter, reduce stockouts, and avoid costly overstock.
ProductFeatureSection.feature2Desc: Our AI Agent reads and understands shipping documents regardless of the format. Extracting and standardizing the data instantly, eliminating manual entry, errors, and lost productivity.
ProductFeatureSection.feature3Desc: Connecting internal systems like ERP, TMS, WMS and documents (PDF, PNG, CSV) of external data sources into one unified flow. Eliminating silos and manual syncing to enable real-time, reliable decision-making across the supply chain.
ProductFeatureSection.feature4Desc: The AI agent automates the process of sourcing, communicating and comparing carriers based on rates, performance, and contract terms.
ProductFeatureSection.feature5Desc: Handling shipment comparison, quoting, recommendation, and booking in a fully automated flow.
ProductFeatureSection.feature6Desc: Preparing and managing customs documents, coordinating with brokers, and clearing shipments automatically. Reducing delays, avoiding manual errors, and eliminating dependency on intermediaries.
ProductFeatureSection.feature7Desc: Monitoring shipments across carriers with real-time location updates and predictive alerts. Enabling early issue detection and faster response to disruptions.
ProductFeatureSection.feature8Desc: Automatically auditing freight invoices to detect overcharges, discrepancies, and billing errors. Filing and managing claims directly with carriers to ensure accurate cost recovery.
